org.synyx.messagesource.filesystem

Class FileSystemMessageProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.synyx.messagesource.filesystem.FileSystemMessageProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageAcceptor, MessageProvider

    public class FileSystemMessageProvider
extends Object
implements MessageProvider, MessageAcceptor
    MessageProvider for messages read from a directory. This acts also as a MessageAcceptor that can write files to the given directory.
    Author:
    Marc Kannegiesser - kannegiesser@synyx.de

      Creates a new instance reading from the path represented by the given String.
